name: Game Dev Company
description:
Game Dev Company is a simulation of game dev company, where you can build company, add furniture,build develop department ,Develop your own games to make money and make your company the most famous game company.


Features
  • Completely customized building design, you can design your unique company.
  • Hire employees and assign departments to let employees work for you.
  • Observe the needs of employees and place suitable recreational facilities near employees to allow employees to relax from exhausting work.
  • Train employees and assign them the right positions so that they can maximize their effectiveness.
